## Community.getCurrentState() method

getCurrentState returns the current state (signatures) for a given ChainTree (its DID)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCurrentState(did: string): Promise<import("tupelo-messages/signatures/signatures_pb").CurrentState>;
```
